results.title: Romance of transportation
results.creator_credit: Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A light-hearted, whimsical look at the way an effective transportation system has been developed in Canada, despite the difficulties of vast distances and natural obstacles. An animated film by skilled animator Colin Low.

results.title: Robocop 2 (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Irvin Kershner, Jon Davison and Orion Pictures Corporation
results.brief_description: In the pollution-ridden future, the city of Detroit is crumbling into decay and poverty. The drug-lords have introduced a new drug, Nuke, which is so seductive a majority of the population have become addicted to it. The only solution to the spiralling catastrophe of crime is the superhuman strength of Robocop, the world’s most efficient crime-fighting machine. This fast- paced, action-crammed sequel features superb special effects. Stars Peter Weller and Nancy Allen.

results.title: Roman scandals
results.creator_credit: Busby Berkeley, Frank Tuttle and Samuel Goldwyn
results.brief_description: An Oklahoma farm boy dreams his way back to the glory of ancient Rome and becomes a spokesman for the oppressed Roman people, suffering under the tyrannical rule of the cruel and sneering Emperor Valerius. A musical comedy of dance and song adapted by William Anthony McGuire from the original story by George S. Kaufman and Robert E. Sherwood with songs by Harry Warren and Al Dublin and production numbers directed by Busby Berkeley. Starring Eddie Cantor and Ruth Etting with Gloria Stuart, Phillips Holmes, Edward Arnold, Alan Mowbray and The Goldwyn Girls and an appearance by Lucille Ball in her film debut as a slave girl.

results.title: Roman holiday
results.brief_description: Audrey Hepburn won an Academy Award for her portrayal of a modern-day Princess rebelling against her royal obligations who escapes a goodwill tour to explore Rome on her own. She meets an American newspaperman (Gregory Peck) who, seeking an exclusive story, pretends ignorance of her true identity. Eddie Albert contributes to the fun as Peck’s carefree cameraman pal. Stylishly directed by William Wyler, this romantic comedy bubbles along at a fine pace, and when the day of fun is over the Princess and the reporter are in love, but each knows that nothing can come of the Roman holiday!

results.title: Rolling Stone: 20 Years of Rock N' Roll
results.brief_description: This video includes interviews with: Mick Jagger, George Harrison, Jerry Garcia, Sting, David Bowie, Tina Turner, Joni Mitchell, Lou Reed, George Clinton, Robbie Robertson, Aretha Franklin, David Byrne, Smokey Robinson, and Dennis Hopper. It also features performances by: The Beatles, Jefferson Airplane, Otis Redding, The Police, Aretha Franklin, The Who, Bob Dylan, The Band, The Rolling Stones, The Doors, Led Zeppelin, T Rex, David Bowie, Bruce Springsteen, Jackson Browne, and The Eagles.

results.title: Rollerball
results.creator_credit: Norman Jewison and United Artists Corporation
results.brief_description: The next war not will be fought - it will be played. The year is 2018. There are no wars. There is no crime. There is only “The Game”. In a world ruled by Corporations, where no-one asks questions, the vicious barbaric “sport” of Rollerball distracts the masses and satisfies their violent and potentially rebellious impulses. Jonathon E., (James Caan), is the champion Rollerball player, but in a world governed by an elite, there is no place for an individual, let alone an icon of heroic achievement. Threatened by the head of the Corporation, (John Houseman), deprived of the woman he loves, (Maud Adams), Jonathan E. must make the choice to “quit while he’s ahead” or suffer the consequences. In an arena, where there are no rules, there can only be one winner. A sci-fi thriller with a chilling climax.

results.title: Roller skate safely
results.brief_description: Illustrates the importance of protective wear in roller skating and also stresses the importance of routine safety and maintenance checks to skates. A variety of skates are shown, with suggestions for purchase or rental. Shows the important basic techniques of how to stop and how to fall.
